entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit Customer Support. Your call is important to us. Please wait while we connect you with the next available agent.
Thank you for calling VeloFit, this is Sarah, how can I help you today?
Finally! I've been on hold forever! I want to return this VeloBand Pulse I bought. It's not working properly.
I understand your frustration, sir. I'm sorry for the wait time. Let me pull up your account. Can I get your name and order number, please?
It's John Smith, order number is VS12345.
Thank you, Mr. Smith. I see your order here with the VeloBand Pulse. What seems to be the issue with it?
The heart rate monitor is completely inaccurate. It's showing 200 bpm when I'm just sitting here! It's basically a useless smart watch at this point. I want to return it. How do I do that?

I'm sorry to hear you are having issues with your VeloBand Pulse. No problem at all, Mr. Smith. Our standard return policy is 90 days, so you are well within the return window. I can process a return for you right away. Are you wanting a refund to your original payment method?
Yes, please. Refund my credit card. This whole experience has been a waste of my time. I can't believe how bad this thing is.

I understand your frustration, Mr. Smith. I've initiated the return process for your VeloBand Pulse. You should receive a prepaid shipping label in your email within the next 24 hours. Simply pack the device securely in its original packaging, attach the label, and drop it off at any authorized shipping location.
Okay, good. And how long before I see the refund?

Once we receive the returned device, the refund should be processed within 7-10 business days. You will receive an email notification once the refund has been issued. I apologize again for the inconvenience you experienced with the VeloBand Pulse.

Alright, that sounds good. So, to be clear, I have to print the label, pack it up, and then drop it off? You sure the refund will go through? I don’t want to deal with this again. My last experience with returns was terrible! It took almost 90 days just to get my money back!

Yes, Mr. Smith, that is correct. You will print the label, pack the device, and drop it off at the shipping location. And yes, the refund will be processed as described. If for some reason you haven't received your refund after 10 days of us receiving the returned item, please call us back and ask to speak with a manager. We will ensure the issue is resolved promptly. Again, I'm so sorry that the VeloBand Pulse didn't meet your expectations.
Okay, that's reassuring. Thank you for your help. I appreciate it.
You're very welcome, Mr. Smith. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
Thank you for calling VeloFit, have a great day!
